text: Islam is the second-largest religion in the United Kingdom, with results from the 2021 Census recorded a population of 6.5% in England and Wales. London has the greatest population of Muslims in the country. The vast majority of Muslims in the United Kingdom adhere to Sunni Islam,UK Masjid Statistics Muslims In Britain (18 August 2010) while smaller numbers are associated with Shia Islam. ==References== UK
title: Islam in the United Kingdom
